abilities.name: Intimidating Fang
abilities.effect: As long as Feraligatr is your Active Pokémon, any damage done to your Pokémon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Pull Away
attacks.effect: If your opponent has 5 or more cards in his or her hand, your opponent discards a number of cards until your opponent has 4 cards left in his or her hand.

attacks.name: Tonnage
attacks.effect: You may do 50 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, Feraligatr does 30 damage to itself.
